thread.title: Julian from Sheffield
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Julian from Sheffield

author: Julian from Sheffield
title: Julian from Sheffield
text:
Have just bought two new pairs of shoes - very comfy and excellent value for money. Had previously ordered a pair but these got lost by the courier - there was no issue with a refund and it was dealt with very efficiently.
This is the third pair of Ecco shoes I have had and they are excellent. Lightweight, robust, very comfortable - all round shoe.
Would highly recommend.
